name: One Life - Parkour Project
description:
One Life - Parkour Project is a third-person Parkour & FreeRunning Sport game.
Immerse yourself in lots of parkour variations and stunts in our immersive environments available directly within the game!
The game is designed to be challenging, and players will need to hone their parkour skills to make progress.



• Gain FLOW Points by doing as many stunts as possible!
• Customize your ATHLETE and/or buy new customizations from the game shop with FLOW Points!
• Do stunts in our available maps, which one will you choose?

PLAY WITH RELAX ♫


One Life - Parkour Game Project is in collaboration with Nick On The Beat! Inside the game you can listen to his beats while you play!
Select any beats from the Playlist Menu in-game and enjoy stunting!
The Nick On The Beat official T-SHIRT will also be available directly in-game in your locker!

EXPLORE THE STUNTING VIBES



Play on the map and spots you most prefer and have fun performing crazy stunts and stratospheric combinations!

New maps will be added in the game in the continuous updates and with brand new features!

With its unique gameplay mechanics, intense challenges, and immersive world, One Life - Parkour Project is a must-play for fans of the parkour genre and those seeking a thrilling, adrenaline-fueled gaming experience.

Put your parkour skills to the test and see if you have what it takes to conquer the game! We are working on making the game multiplayer! Be the first to get your hands on it!
